Sentencas: Integrated Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IP-SOFC), which utilise a Ni/YSZ based anode, have been operated under direct hydrogen-methane mixture fuel injection at 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: This process has shown some disadvantages in fuelling to the IP-SOFC; producing carbon deposition from the methane in the fuel mixture, causing direct structural damage to the IP-SOFC surface and blocking the area of activation for reaction processes and reducing the performances.
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: These factors were shown to adversely affect the performance of the IP-SOFC over time.
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The aim of this paper is to calculate the amount of carbon deposited through the use of temperature programmed oxidation (TPO).
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: In addition, the distribution of carbon is studied and analysed on all parts of the IP-SOFC cells.
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The results show that both amorphous and graphitic carbon were formed causing microstructural damage thereby reducing the cell performance.
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: Furthermore, the reaction temperature was demonstrated to increase the total amount of carbon deposition.
Titulo: Analysing Carbon Deposition on Ni/YSZ Anode Tested in an Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)
